description:
11.119 histogram
Compute and draw a color distribution histogram for the input video.

The computed histogram is a representation of the color component
distribution in an image.

Standard histogram displays the color components distribution in an image.
Displays color graph for each color component. Shows distribution of
the Y, U, V, A or R, G, B components, depending on input format, in the
current frame. Below each graph a color component scale meter is shown.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: histogram

parameters.description: Set height of level. Default value is 200. Allowed range is [50, 2048].
parameters.name: level_height

parameters.description: Set height of color scale. Default value is 12. Allowed range is [0, 40].
parameters.name: scale_height

parameters.description:
Set display mode. It accepts the following values:

‘stack’

Per color component graphs are placed below each other.

‘parade’

Per color component graphs are placed side by side.

‘overlay’

Presents information identical to that in the parade, except that the graphs representing color components are superimposed directly over one another.

Default is stack.
parameters.name: display_mode

parameters.description: Set mode. Can be either linear, or logarithmic. Default is linear.
parameters.name: levels_mode

parameters.description: Set what color components to display. Default is 7.
parameters.name: components

parameters.description:
Set colors mode. It accepts the following values:

‘whiteonblack’
‘blackonwhite’
‘whiteongray’
‘blackongray’
‘coloronblack’
‘coloronwhite’
‘colorongray’
‘blackoncolor’
‘whiteoncolor’
‘grayoncolor’

Default is whiteonblack.
parameters.name: colors_mode
